input.sentences: [male] and [female] hosted their annual halloween party .
[male] came dressed as a smurf killer .
the gang had a good time relaxing and hanging out .
[female] won the prize money for best costume .
everyone had a great time and [male] begged them to do it again next year .
output.sentences: Everyone always dresses up in scary or funny costumes.
It is a great time to make new friends.
The party has lots of games for everyone to play.
Everyone had a lot of fun.
